conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a disaster movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: I've got just the thing for you! If you're in the mood for a disaster movie, I highly recommend "Life of Pi". It's an epic adventure film that features stunning visuals and a heartwarming story of survival against all odds - think shark-infested waters, treacherous storms, and a fearless Bengal tiger! Leonardo DiCaprio's voiceover brings it all to life.

Plus, it features Jim Carrey in a unique role as the unwitting star of his own TV show.

I think I have just the right movie for you! Have you considered "Paycheck"? It's a thrilling ride with Ben Affleck playing an engineer who finds himself on the run after trying to uncover the truth about his mysterious past. With a mix of action, mystery, and twists, it's a great fit for someone who enjoys disaster movies.

Or if you're in the mood for something a bit different, I'd recommend "The Violent Kind". This horror-thriller has a unique premise with a group of bikers being terrorized by a possessed friend and 1950s-style rockabilly gang. It's a wild ride that will keep you on the edge of your seat!
